com.comfortanalytics.aon.json

Class JsonWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.comfortanalytics.aon.AbstractWriter
      • com.comfortanalytics.aon.json.AbstractJsonWriter
        • com.comfortanalytics.aon.json.JsonWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Aconstants, Awriter, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.Appendable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class JsonWriter
extends AbstractJsonWriter
    Json implementation of Awriter intended for OutputStreams and Writers. While JsonAppender can also handle OutputStreams and Writer, this is more performant.

    The same instance can be reused with the setOutput methods.

    This class is not thread safe.

    See Also:
    Awriter
